New Records: LeBron James and his son Bronny are the first father and son to play in any NBA game at the same time.
Key Match Events: LeBron James hit a 3-pointer shortly after committing a turnover.
Bronny James entered the game as a substitute to begin the second quarter.
Bronny James committed two turnovers in their first two minutes together.
LeBron James set a screen for Bronny's 3-point attempt, but Bronny missed.
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James has spoken for years about his longtime dream of playing in the NBA with one of his sons.
The Lakers made it a reality when they grabbed Bronny with the 55th pick in the draft.
Anthony Davis also made his preseason debut against the Suns after a busy summer.
Post-Match Reflections: Head coach JJ Redick said the Lakers already have discussed the logistics of the next historic moment.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game coincidentally happened on Bronny’s 20th birthday.
LeBron James is beginning his record-tying 22nd season in the NBA.
Bronny James played just one season at Southern California before entering the draft and joining the Lakers.
The Lakers have four more preseason games — all outside Los Angeles while their home arena is being renovated.
